Author of Living with Guns: a Liberalâ€™s Case for the Second Amendment, Craig Whitney joins the Institute on to speak as part of the Bookmark Series.

Craig Whitney is a former foreign correspondent and editor at the New York Times and has written Living with Guns where he explores the Second Amendment, calling it one of the most divisive issues in America today.

Whitney follows the evolution of guns, regulation and violence, beginning with the early American settlers for whom they were a simple necessity. ...Through this careful progression, he is able to focus on practical solutions to gun violence, regulation for some individuals and demonstrates how Americans can safely live with guns.
